## Rental of Truck or Trailer Mounted LED Video Walls
#### Request for Standing Offer

### Solicitation Number
Solicitation Number: 10211511

### Title
The Government of Canada is seeking a Standing Offer Agreement for the rental of truck or trailer mounted LED video walls.

### Description
The Contractor will be responsible for providing high-definition LED video walls mounted on trailers or trucks for various exhibitions, conferences, and events at the National Capital Region (NCR). The video walls must be capable of displaying dynamic visual content.

### Scope of Work
- Rentals of vehicle-mounted LED video walls displaying high-definition visuals
- Ability to display dynamic content including digital signage, maps, and moving images
- Compatibility with various content management systems
- Installation, operation, and removal of equipment
- Ability to deliver on short notice

### Contract Details
- Solicitation Number: 10211511
- Tender Closing Date: October 21, 2022, at 14:00 (Eastern Time)
- Contract Period: N/A

### Important Information

- The Contracting Authority is the Canadian Heritage.
- The procurement is covered under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and other international agreements.
- The locations of delivery and implementation are within the NCR.

### Bidding Instructions

Bidders must download the solicitation package and review the bidding instructions through the Buy mer Canada platform at https://canadabuys.canada.ca.

### Contact Information
For clarifications and concerns, please contact Nicole Sabourin at:
- Email:  contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca
- Website: No URL is provided.

### Accessibility
The procurement process is open to all interested suppliers.

### Competition
The procurement process will be conducted under a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) with a competitive solicitation.

### Language of Contract
English and French.
